Throne-timed-notification.message: If you'd like to send me a gift, I'd be greatly appreciative. https://throne.com/shadav

The Box Discord.message: You know you want in the box! Join in the chaos on discord: https://discord.gg/FUY4WAhQkW

Collabing Community Discord.message: Collabing Community. Helping Others Is Our Goal, What's Yours? : https://discord.gg/HuxQJPudp8

Donate.message: If you'd like to help me out, any little bit is greatly appreciated. https://paypal.me/TheShadavNetwork THANK YOU! I will never forget what you have done.
